评论详情: I didn’t expect much from this suit but was pleasantly surprised. The material was better quality than I expected. It wrinkles quite easily so needs to be steamed before wearing each time.  The fit was decent, but not great for movement. While standing, it was great and comfortable, but with bending or stretching, it didn’t stay in place very well. With modern materials being so stretchy, this didn’t have the movement that I’ve come to enjoy.  Still, for the price it is a very good value. I did really like the color. I got several compliments on it. Also like the vest, as many suits don’t come with that anymore. I was happy with the fit overall.

This 3 piece suit is perfect for my teen boy's upcoming winter dance. I love the price! He likes the inside pockets and adjustable waistband in the pants. True to size. He got a Large. He is 6 feet tall. 175lbs
Buen entalle de estre traje
All white and just right
It felt more like costume material. For the price, it wasn't worth it. The fit did not match the chart.
It was true to size and fitted perfectly.

评论概述: A great suit that looks tailored, is well made, and won't break the bank.
评论详情: This is a really nice suit for only $75 at the time of this writing. I ordered black, because it goes with everything I own, lol, and it looks great. I was a little worried about the slim fit thing, cause I'm normally more of an athletic type build, with a small belly which encroach on my body when I was in my 50's. I used the chart provided, and determined I needed a large. I am pleased to say that the suit fits great, and it really slims down my look, which is fantastic. The fabric doesn't have much in the way of stretch, do I am glad it fits just right. I have not tried to wash this yet, so I can't say for sure how well it will wash up, or if it wrinkles after washing it. I have only worn this once so far, to a wedding, but it was nice to have something like this to use. I think this is a great suit for an unbelievably low cost, and I can recommend it to you.

For the price of $75, this suit exceeds my expectations.  It looks good and the cut is nice.  It does seem to run just a tad small.  The vest and jacket are a little more snug than I expected.  The pants on the other hand are really narrow.  The waist fits a little snug, but wearable.  The legs are really narrow though.  If you are a really skinny guy, you'll probably be fine.  But if you have an athletic build, it's tough to fit your legs in these pants and still be able to move.  Which brings me to another point.  There is almost no flex to this suit like most modern suits have.  It feels more like a traditional suit from 10-15 years ago before they started putting flex in everything.But as I said before.  If you are looking for a $75 suit, this one looks very good.  I would just recommend ordering it a size up.  Even in my case, where I will never wear the pants, the vest and jacket alone are worth the price.

I love the green color of the suit. It doesn't look 100% like the photo, it's a little bit darker than the color looks on the photo but it still looks great. The suit also fits very nicely. I was worried about the pants not fitting since sometimes it's difficult to purchase pants online without trying them on first. But this stretches so you don't need to worry about the sizing. If you order a size that is around your waist size you'll be perfectly fine.

I wanted a fitted suit and I didn't expect much from this for the price but it was better than I thought. At 5'11" and 180 lbs I got the small and it fit exactly how I wanted it to look. The downside to this is that the zipper broke the first time I tried it on so these pants are actually never going to get used. For this reason I gave it a 4 star review. I'm not going to say they are all poor quality but the fact that mine broke immediately meant I couldn't give it a full 5 stars. However, I will say that for this price I definitely recommend someone to buy this because if it fits then it's a steal. It looks good and it's a good price!

评论概述: Runs slightly oversized.  Excellent quality and a good looking suit.
评论详情: This suit is a beautiful color in person—it's stunning. Upon first inspection, the suit looks well-made and is of good quality for the price point. It ran a little bigger than I was hoping for. I am shorter and thinner than most, but I would have been very pleased if it had fit. It's a great value suit for a prom or homecoming.

评论概述: Great for a party. Not for the red carpet
评论详情: Are you having a disco party? NYE bash. Are things gunna get wild and your positive that by the end of the night you will be covered in tequila or vomit? Well then you need an inexpensive suit. This suit. Comes in lots of colors and will have you looking stylish for the big night.

评论概述: Tuxedo for Men Two Button Solid
评论详情: Make a dashing impression with the Men’s 3-Piece Slim Fit Tuxedo. Featuring a solid jacket, vest, and pants, this suit is the epitome of elegance and sophistication. Perfect for weddings, business meetings, or any formal event, it offers a sharp look without sacrificing comfort. Tailored to perfection, this tuxedo fits like a dream – just add a bow tie and you’re all set for the spotlight!

This is now the coolest suit I own. It’s not an elegant fabric by any means, but it’s a suitable one. The size chart is very good. The jacket and the vest fit to a T and, as with all the hem on the pants needs to be adjusted, I can’t wait to wear it early next month when I will be seeing at a film festival gala in Washington state .

I helped my husband pick this out. I have been wanting to get him a green suit for a while but I haven't found the right color green until now. This looks so great. I love the rich color - I think it works best for fall winter. It can even be a Holiday suit - its a great Christmas color. My husband ordered his usual size and it fits great except its a little long in the sleeves. He will have to get it tailored, but he does that with all his suits. Overall we are really happy with it!

评论概述: Great Looking Suit - Love the Black
评论详情: This is a really great black suit, I love the slim fit and the sleek black look. Definitely a sharp look for the occasion! I plan wearing this to a couple weddings this year and can say I'm excited to see what compliments I receive. For anyone looking for a slim fit suit, this is definitely a great option and a reasonable price.

评论概述: Once you tackle the wrinkles a nice set
评论详情: Luckily I have a somewhat average body, no extra long limbs or anything like that. So standard sizes usually work good for me and this one did too. I made sure to look at the size chart just to be sure and I recommend you do too. The wrinkles holy moly. Never been more thankful for my steam iron. Made pretty short work of the wrinkles but this material I know they’ll be back if I don’t maintain proper care of it. Color is great, just as pictured, material is about what i expected, nothing too fancy. The pockets have the white sliver of color stitched in the breast pocket, would have liked the ability to keep or remove it but it’s okay not the end of the world. Truthfully about a 3.7/5 rounded up even though I usually don’t. Get past the wrinkles and it’s a solid 4 star product for a fair price.

评论概述: Sized correctly at least for me
评论详情: This is a low end tux obviously, but it's not that bad in appearance although it does feel more Summery than a heavy well built tux. Color was correct, size was correct, looks good and is low cost. If you rarely use formal wear, this is a great easy out to renting or spending a fortune. I go out once a year (wife forces me lol) to an annual event at a club we are members of. I'm tired of renting and really have no use for a more expensive one. So this fits the requirements well.

This is a nice 3 piece suit. The white color is pure and bright white. The suit is made from a quality material too. The only thing to me is that I slightly feel like it runs a little big. I thought a Large would fit a little more snug being that it is a suit, but it was slightly larger than I had hoped. I guess the maker wants us to order down to get a snug fit like a suit should be instead of making it that way. It still fits nice and will look great.

Curiosity got the better of me when I saw this suit come across the items for review. After opening this Men's Suits 3 Piece Slim Fit Dress Tuxedo for Men Two Button Solid Jacket Vest Pants Set I put it on. I was surprised that everything fit as well and I expect, I could actually wear this straight out of the box with some alterations needed. The pants were about 2 inches too long and the vest is on the tight side but the jacket sleeves are perfect the shoulders are good and everything pretty much fits. This material is thin and makes a nice summer suit and with some color could make and I catching suit. I would recommend this suit for the money as a casual summer suit that is made well and fits as expected.
This suit fit pretty well.  The size is as expected.  The quality is good for what I expected, no real surprise.  Overall, I like this, I wasn't let down at all.

评论概述: For the price, is nice for what you get.
评论详情: This is a great value. Is it the nicest most well made suit you will own, no. It is good for the price for sure.

评论概述: Such a beautiful blue! Good quality suit
评论详情: This is such a good quality dress suit. I love the design, especially the blue color is so beautiful.  It's in on the thinner side and lighter, which I appreciate as I don't like heavy suits as they tend to be hot. And I usually get hot wearing suits. So I like this, it's not as hot as others I've worn. It fits very comfortably  The pants are decent quality as well. Let me have very good stretch for the waist. It is not too tight though, i will need to put use a belt for this to keep them up, which is fine. The vest is decent as well.  There was some loose strings coming from the right sleeve. But no other issues found. The pockets are sewed in like other suits. Personally I find that stupid but that's normal unfortunately. But isn't hard to undo the sticking to use the pockets. I didn't even need a tool.  All in all it's a very nice budget suit. Nothing exceptional but its good quality and very nice soft quality material.

I got an XL because I got a tummy.  The suit color is great (I think I got denim which is like a darkish blue grey).  The pants have a stretchy waist which is great for me.  The overall FIT of the suit is obviously not as good as something that was tailored.  I think its FINE.  For the price its certainly something I'd wear out if I needed to be in a suit.  For a really special occasion I don't think this is it, but its a fun full suit for a cheap price.  Not bad.

评论概述: Sleek Elegance: Men's 3-Piece Slim Fit Dress Tuxedo
评论详情: Step up your formalwear game with the Men’s 3-Piece Slim Fit Dress Tuxedo. This classic tuxedo set combines style, sophistication, and a modern fit, making it perfect for any formal occasion. Here’s why this tuxedo is an excellent choice:  Slim Fit Design: The slim fit cut offers a contemporary and tailored look, enhancing your silhouette with a sleek, streamlined appearance. It’s designed to provide a modern and fashionable profile without compromising on comfort.  Three-Piece Set: This tuxedo comes as a complete three-piece set, including a two-button solid jacket, vest, and matching pants. The coordinated look ensures a polished and cohesive outfit for any formal event.  Two-Button Jacket: The two-button design of the jacket is a timeless classic, offering a sophisticated and versatile style that suits various formal occasions. The jacket’s structured fit enhances the overall look of the tuxedo.  Elegant Vest: The included vest adds an extra layer of refinement to your outfit. It’s designed to complement the jacket and pants, providing a distinguished and elegant touch to your ensemble.  Matching Pants: The matching pants are tailored to fit seamlessly with the rest of the tuxedo set. They offer a coordinated look that completes the formalwear ensemble with a touch of class.  High-Quality Fabric: Crafted from premium materials, this tuxedo is designed for durability and comfort. The fabric feels luxurious against the skin while maintaining its shape and appearance throughout the event.  Versatile Occasions: Perfect for weddings, galas, business functions, and other formal events, this tuxedo set provides a stylish and sophisticated choice for any special occasion.  Classic Color Options: Available in a range of classic colors, the tuxedo offers versatility and the ability to match various formal themes. Choose a color that suits your personal style and the nature of the event.  Easy Care: The high-quality fabric is designed for easy care, making it a practical choice for maintaining a crisp and clean appearance throughout the event.  Tailored Fit: The slim fit and tailored design ensure that the tuxedo provides a sharp and well-fitted look, enhancing your overall appearance and confidence.  Stylish and Timeless: This 3-piece tuxedo set combines modern style with classic elegance, ensuring you look your best at any formal occasion. Its sleek design and quality craftsmanship make it a standout choice for any event.  The Men’s 3-Piece Slim Fit Dress Tuxedo is a sophisticated and stylish choice for any formal event. With its slim fit design, complete set of jacket, vest, and pants, and high-quality fabric, it offers both elegance and comfort for a memorable appearance.

This men's slim fit 3-piece suit includes a solid jacket, vest, and dress pants. It's made of polyester and viscose, with a classic design, notch lapel, and side vents. Suitable for various occasions, including weddings, business events, and parties. The suit is dry-cleaning recommended for care. Size should be included the length of the pants.
Fit is true to size and the quality is really very good.  It looks like a more expensive suit than it actually is.  It feels well made and looks good on.  Very happy with it.

This suit is really nice quality. It is well made and all the stitching is secure. The material is nice and its well lined and feels like quality. The fit is a bit tight but that’s expected with a slim fit type suit. I am really pleased with its quality and fit. Looks great.

I love this beautiful Dark Green 3-piece suit from Elionm. Made from a blend of Polyester and Viscose (Rayon), the suit is tailored well with tight seams and full lining in the vest and jacket. The jacket is single breasted with 2-button closure, 2 front flap pockets, a handkerchief pocket with a decorative faux hanky and double back vents. Each sleeve has 4 decorative buttons. In the interior of the jacket, each side has a wallet pocket (the right side one has a button closure) and the left side also has a watch pocket. The vest has a 4 button closure, an adjustable rear belt, a watch pocket on each side and another handkerchief pocket with a decorative faux hanky (copying the one on the jacket). The pants have a flat front, 2 front slash pockets, 2 rear hip pockets with button closure and a front zipper with dual hook and button closures. The pants also have an adjustable waistband (up to about 2”). As I noted above, I chose the Dark Green and it’s a great looking deep green. The pictures don’t really do it justice. If you’re in the market for a good looking 3-piece suit, follow the measurements on Elionm’s size chart, pick the color you want and you won’t be disappointed.

This is a fantastic suit for the price. I think that the jacket alone is worth the cost: It includes lots of nice detailing, such as two interior pockets and some very classy looking red stitched details in the liner.  The vest includes a silken back and an adjustable belt.  The slacks are nice, too.  Best part is the price: Just $76.75 as I write this. What a great deal!
Very well made! Comfortable, but will require some slight alterations for a perfect fit.

评论概述: Ordered the light gray, pleasantly surprised
评论详情: You won't find a better suit for this price, hands down. It's 100% polyester, but there's a nice lining and the quality is actually pretty great. You have double clasps on the pants, extra buttons for the jacket, and good stitching.  I'm a taller with a lean build (6'1 and 175lb), so I took a gamble using the above sizing guides and went with a Medium. To my surprise, this almost fits me perfectly. Although, I would probably go for a Large jacket instead, because the Medium shoulders and arm length aren't quite enough for my build. The pants waist and length are perfect for my height.  The pant cut/shape is also in the middle of a slim fit and regular fit, right about where you want a suit. One thing that I'm not absolutely in love with is the white trim lapel sticking out of the jacket and vest.  Sadly, I don't have a full length mirror to take photos. The model photos in the description are accurate, so if you like that fit and finish, this is a fantastic purchase.

For the price you get a 3 piece suit. The material is polyester and viscose. It did not come in a box and it will need to be dry cleaned for you to start using it. Tailoring seems good. There is a two button Tuxedo and a an adjustable waist pant. And a vest with pockets. There is a white lining for the front pockets of both the vest and the jacket. I do not like that very much. This is more for younger non-business uses.

I couldn’t be happier with this black three-piece suit! The fit is impeccable, with the pants, vest, and blazer coming together perfectly to create a sleek, sophisticated look. The material feels high-quality, and the tailored cut gives it a sharp and modern edge. Whether for a formal event or a stylish day at the office, this suit commands attention and exudes confidence. Highly recommended for anyone looking to elevate their wardrobe!

评论概述: Stylish and Affordable with a perfect fit!
评论详情: I recently ordered this suit for a formal event, and I’m impressed with the overall quality, especially considering the price. It fit perfectly even though I had some questions regarding the sizing since I was between 2 different sizes. But the slim fit is very flattering, and the material feels good against the skin. The jacket, vest, and pants are all well-tailored, fitting me just right without needing any alterations. And the color is deep and rich, making it look much more expensive than it actually is.  One thing I appreciated was how comfortable it felt even after wearing it for several hours. The fabric has a bit of stretch, so it moves with you instead of feeling restrictive. The two-button design on the jacket adds a modern touch, and the vest fits snugly without being too tight.  Overall, this suit is a great option for anyone looking for a stylish and affordable suit. It’s versatile enough to be worn for weddings, formal events, or even just a night out. Highly recommend it!

Comprado en talla S (mido 1.80 y peso 63kg)  Queda perfecto a la medida, el color es como se describe, el chaleco trae para ajustar. Se planca con facilidad. Una excelente opción si quieres algo diferente.
